lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because:
It is a small step in changing the world for the better and give a little hands up to people with same dreams and hopes as I, but limited purely through circumstances not of their choosing.
Having traveled extensively through poor countries and meeting so many open friendly people and seeing how they lived, it made me humble and appreciate what an easy life I had had - simply because of where I was born.
I hope that my loans help people achieve their dreams and hopes, to ultimately make them, their family and their community a better place
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers at a university.

lender.name: Mangoong Deng Aguek
lender.loan_because: I wanted to show up that business is a faction of long and short time throught difference directions of life
lender.occupational_info:
My work is agriculture , Subject: Financial Assistance We invite you all to join us in the development of our region, South Sudan under the guardianship of our respective governments of the Republic of Sudan and Government of south Sudan (Goss). Under the theme: - Working For A New Better Sudan. In the course of the last five years, the Goss-the Government of South Sudan maintained a consistence policy of encouraging foreign investments, essential for every business and individual who is in close touch with Comprehensive Peace Agreement (CPA) the incentive embodied in the relevant statutes and to be extremely effective in helping to meet the development needs of the South Sudan region. This judicious mix of policies has; in fact, enabled the Goss to establish a reputation throughout the Sudan as a premise location for almost any kind of regional and international business according to the recent report released by Comprehensive Peace Agreement (CPA). This is because for people of all Sudan who are carrying heavy burdens’. Burden of hopeless, fear, anxiety, weariness, sickness, and poverty or nervous exhaustion, sorrow, or whatever others kind of burden it may be against them for almost 50 years. Lets encourage them to brings the best possible good development of help them to have hopeful for their home land, reconstruction. Important requirements of (PAPFP) Pinyda Agric-Product and Food Programs, are shaped by its relative lack of manufacturing resources’ and by the world technological needs of its advanced export-oriented industrial economy. In order turn out the countless products that are shipped to virtually every country in the world by South Sudan. Supplies, vast quantities industrial raw material must uses benefit of the region. For a very long time , the region lost its benefit to the animals , birds and other creatures; and traditional work of the people for the land , traditional families of Sudanese in use or planting of the land with cereal crops , such as sorghum (Dura) , maize, fruits and other different kinds of crops on their small farms. For many years the families do not grow enough food for themselves ; suddenly the war passed over them for more than 30 years , they died in two pointedly windows; war and hunger ; but now Comprehensive Peace Agreement -CPA ,has just closed for them one window ;and remains one , that we are calling all of you to close it. This is because they don’t have agricultural equipment machineries that may pull and clear the surface of the earth. Changing the way people farm is one way South Sudan can ends poverty. These years that South Sudan has got chance not to be waste, we all acknowledge that when people are at war, and also at the same time, hunger. Getting food is difficult and to have access to food is the most important thing to everybody. hungry people always have many reasons in the health area, tires easily; so they may not have enough energy to plant more seeds or water their crops; because they depend on traditional farming due to lack of the agricultural equipment machineries, lack of enough food so children are hungry, when children are hungry they don’t have school, they lost up their (eschatological life) future state for new way tomorrow. In fact, the hunger is a problem that must be solved before other cases can be solved. South Sudan’s rapid population growth makes it hard to solve the problem of hunger , because most farmers used simple traditional hand tools and farm the same land year after year without the use of fertilizers , lack of skills, experience and machineries , there is limitation for self human energy; limited supply of every needs . In fact it will cost us time, energy, ideological, mentally, financial and education; this shall be final decision to produce enough food and this can be achieved only when agricultural productivity is taken as a priority to benefit throughout four seasons of the year. So, Goss and PAPFP are already working on this possibility ; by last the few years many Sudanese organizations would probably go to find out how to solve this case it life is found to be possible ; so , such as mechanized farming means '' the use of modern machinery on farms . On many modern farm the work of laborers’ is done by up - to- date machines, the use of these help to save a lot of time and labor and brings in big profits . For instance in modern orchards even the picking of crop or fruits is done by machinery; such as, a tractors with long metal arm drives up to a green cereal or trees and fasten as ripe fruits drop is caught by special device then it is sent along a conveyors belt and packed into large wooden boxes. Therefore we are asking your sharing in this co-operation movement for development of food programs in ten states of South Sudan region. Your Excellency, having said this last and not least, we invite the members of your entire business people to invest in South Sudan and encourage them for development for the people of south Sudan. , We have already admitted the lax and fragility of the inexperience which can be corrected by this time. Also we solicit Turkey Embassy, Consulate and Senior Officials to cooperate with us and offer courses or trainings to some of our staffs in any fields, who could come back and help in development of this nation.
Therefore, the followings are Agricultural Equipments our company Request Funding for :- • Primary Tillage Machines for shallow and deep tillage, residue cutting, ploughs and heavy disc harrows • Agricultural Tractors (5-10) for pulling or pushing agricultural equipments, for plowing, tilling, digging, harrowing and planting. Dumping trucks, excavators, and loaders. • Sowing and planting machines, like grain drilling machine, planters and transplanters. • Harvesting machines, like grain harvesting, vegetable harvesting, and root crops harvesting. • Chemical spraying machine (mounted sprayers) and trailed sprayers. • Chemical fertilizing machine, like fertilizer spreader, fertilizer pumps • Crop drying machine, like grain dryers and tea dryers. • Electricity generators • Water pumping machines. • Transportation trucks to deliver produces from areas of production to areas of consumption and marketing.
Your kind consideration towards this request would highly be appreciated.
Thanks you so much. Sincerely yours,
Director General Mangoong Deng Aguek

lender.loan_because: My undergraduate studies centered around development issues, specifically microfinance. I've always held a healthy level of skepticism for the global institutions charged with the task of alleviating poverty. The top down model of development doesn't seem to be working. Grassroots microfinance has provided the most efficient and effective model for directly affecting change in peoples lives. I'm thankful that it has become so easy to give with Kiva's web based model for microfinance.

lender.name: RC Limburgerhof/VP
lender.loan_because: we - the members of the Rotary Club Limburgerhof/Vorderpfalz - find the idea behind Kiva inspiring. We are fully convinced that microfinance is a very effective way of helping people overcome long-term poverty. Let’s together empower people to make their own business ideas a reality -- so that their dreams come true. For this reason we decided that each member of our club would support Kiva by making at least one loan.

lender.name: Sendrejas
lender.loan_because: i want to make model farm of my own for farmers to replicate or an area that will serves as demo farm. I've been serving voluntarily to help farmers in the remote areas of Compostela Valley Province (COMVAL), Mindanao, Philippines in alternative livelihood to increase their income. upon reflection of the things that i have done, it come to me that it is best if i do it my way and for them to replicate. it could be the best proof and showcase for them also to do the same. what i visualize is to develop a farm with best combination of oil bearing trees (macademia or tamano tree), fruit crops with aquaculture and vegetables. in short the promotion of short, medium and long term crops. in that way the concept of FAITH (food always in the home) will be assured.
lender.occupational_info: Previously i worked with private institution mostly dealing with community organizing and in institutional building and developing alternative livelihood for farmers. recently i worked with the Government but my vacant time (mostly weekend and holidays) are devoted to helping farmers, conducting training and lectures on organic farming with them.

lender.name: Yudha
lender.occupational_info:
Assalamualykum,
I am a university student in Indonesia, I am a Muslim. I have ideals that my parents can be a pilgrimage to Mecca. My job as a child is tried as soon as possible so that the ideals were rapidly achieved but I do not like to beg. Here I tried, I've had a palm garden that I manage. I need funds for development in order to obtain results that a lot and enough to finance my dream. I repeatedly get a good chance, but my situation does not always have cash in an amount sufficient to take every opportunity. In my state to borrow money without collateral is difficult, I can not use the guarantee to every ground that I have. Because the land that I use instead of pure land belongs to me but my brother. Based on my experience of the world's palm oil plantations is very promising. I have the calculations and can afford to pay back the loans within 3 years or less from that time. I will attach full details on calculation and calculations of risk accompanied my efforts. I am very grateful to anyone who wants to give me my chance to try.
Thanks for your attention
Walaykomsalam
